statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, registration_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name AS Name, address AS Address FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(supplier_id) AS total_suppliers FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM Suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name FROM Products p JOIN Suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, certification_name FROM Suppliers, Certifications WHERE Suppliers.supplier_id = Certifications.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 100
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_location = 'New York'
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, product_price FROM Products INNER JOIN Suppliers ON Products.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT supplier_name, certification_name, certification_expiry FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Certifications ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Certifications.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, country, is_approved FROM suppliers;
SELECT contact_name, email FROM supplier_contacts;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM supplier_products;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, expiration_date FROM supplier_certifications;
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, country, is_approved FROM suppliers WHERE is_approved = TRUE
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, country FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT sp.product_name, sp.price, sp.quantity, s.supplier_name FROM supplier_products sp JOIN suppliers s ON sp.supplier_id = s.supplier_id
SELECT sc.certification_name, sc.certification_date, sc.expiration_date, s.supplier_name FROM supplier_certifications sc JOIN suppliers s ON sc.supplier_id = s.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, country FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, country FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT supplier_name, email, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT supplier_name, country, COUNT(supplier_id) AS supplier_count FROM suppliers GROUP BY country ORDER BY supplier_count DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, p.price FROM products p INNER JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT c.certification_name, pc.issue_date, pc.expiration_date FROM certifications c INNER JOIN product_certifications pc ON c.certification_id = pc.certification_id;
